Class DefaultSignatureValidationResult

java.lang.Object
se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.impl.DefaultSignatureValidationResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignatureValidationResult
public class DefaultSignatureValidationResult extends Object implements SignatureValidationResult
Default implementation of the SignatureValidationResult interface.
Author:
Martin Lindström (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • getStatusMessage

      public String getStatusMessage()
      Gets a status message. To be used for logging purposes.

      For non-successful results a message is always returned.

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      status message

    • getSignerCertificate

      public X509Certificate getSignerCertificate()
      Gets the certificate that was used to sign the validated document.

      May be null in the rare cases when the certificate is not included in the signature, and when no validation certificates were supplied to the validation process.

      Specified by:
      getSignerCertificate in interface SignatureValidationResult
      Returns:
      the signature certificate

    • setSignerCertificate

      signerCertificate - signer certificate

    • getClaimedSigningTime

      public Date getClaimedSigningTime()
      Gets the claimed signing time.

      This is a signing time asserted within the signature, not asserted by any external time stamp service.

      Specified by:
      getClaimedSigningTime in interface SignatureValidationResult
      Returns:
      the claimed signing time (if available)

    • isEtsiAdes

      public boolean isEtsiAdes()
      Predicate that tells if the signature that was validated is a signature according to the corresponding ETSI AdES signature profile.
      Specified by:
      isEtsiAdes in interface SignatureValidationResult
      Returns:
      true if this signature conforms to the ETSI AdES profile, and false otherwise
